summary: Become the god of all wizards!
descriptionHtml:
Become the god of all wizards and decimate anything or anyone in your way!
Don\'t hesitate to let me know of any problems or ideas you may have/experienced.
Also feel free on uploading your own images of the mod. (I\'m sure you guys and gals can make a better screenshot)

[youtube]nnr35WxVg8U[/youtube] [youtube]6R0gBAr-F68[/youtube]

Currently there is only two spells but there will be plenty more in the near future. Feel free to comment your own ideas for future spells!

(I know that the spells are a tad OP but for a god, it may be underpowered)
Spells; (All Spells can be bought from the court mage in Whiterun)
Death Shock (Magicka Cost: 300): A spell of great magnitude that can kill any creature or group with a single cast 
Fire Surge (Magicka Cost: 200): Sends an intense ball of pure volcanic heat towards the unsuspecting victim

Link;
Video: http://adf.ly/CmMTc
Donate: http://adf.ly/CjGAO
Subscribe to my YouTube channel: http://adf.ly/Cn88g

Install Instructions

Mod Manager;

Download with Mod Manager and once the mod has been downloaded, Double click on the mod to install into the game.

If you manually downloaded the file and have Mod Manager, Start up Mod Manager and select the mod tab once open.
Click \"Add Mod From File\" and select the mod from your preferred download folder. Double click the mod to install.

Manual Download;

Once the file has been downloaded, extract the file using winrar or win7 or any other achieving program.
Drag and drop the ESP file into the data folder in you skyrim directory.


To update to the next version manually, delete the ESP file and paste the new ESP file into the data folder

If using modloader, simply install the newer version

!!!CAUTION!!!

If you are updating from V0.10 to V0.20, DELETE THE OLD ESP FILE! you will also have to buy the spell tomes again.
Because you would have lost the spells.
author: cvolt1
